summary: This is a simple replacer for the Nocturnal statue.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Nocturnal statue
Author: Edhildil
06,24,2014
ver1

LOL!

This is a simple replacer for the Nocturnal statue.

This is mostly just a silly mod but I thought some of you would like it, again.


File:

Data_meshes_clutter_statues_nocturnalstatue

My other statue mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55601/?]Edhildils Meridia Statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55220/?]Edhildils Sexy Azura Statue[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55167/?]Sevenbase Dibella statue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55195/?]Sexy Mara statue[/url]

Tools:

Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
Microsoft Paint (BMP to JPEG for screenies)

Credits:

Edhildil (statue)
Sevenity (sevenbase body)
Bethesda (original statue mesh)

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

Usage:

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also

be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
